This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL sender.getStats() via addTransceiver should return stats report containing outbound-rtp stats pc.addTransceiver is not a function
FAIL sender.getStats() via addTrack should return stats report containing outbound-rtp stats promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: sender.getStats is not a function"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
